string.value: I need to go see Grako!!

Grako of Showa Town has a stomach ache which seems to have stemmed from indigestion. I wanted to get Grako some medicine, but she said she doesn't think she'll need a medicine; instead, she wants to drink soft cider. I should go get some cider for her..\n\n#t2022002# #b#c2022002##k/1
I gave Grako the cider, but... oh man, he's been FAKING IT! Arrrgh... and anyway, he said he actually wants to ask for another favor, this one being REAL. Should I trust him this time?
Oh my gosh, my stomach hurts like craaaaazy!! Can you help me out here, if you have any time?
Thanks. You know, I've just ate, and ... I think I have a stomach ache, and ... I think it'll go away with a nice bottle of cider...
Argh... I'm sick!! My gosh, my stomach is killing me...

Thank you sooo much~~ Ahh, this feels sooo goood! You know, you seem like a really nice person! And... I think I have something to tell you. I... don't have a stomach ache actually; I just really wanted to drink some cider. Sorry~!
What? You didn't buy it yet? Sooo Disappointed!
